features.label: client features
list: ordering food from resturants near you as it location based.
add your own reviews (review per order).
guest cart to add items in the cart without loging in (will merge your orders with old ones when loging in if any).

features.label: admin features
list: creating your own resturant page and the ability to choose the delivery area you want as it shows a circle around your location indeciting your delivery area.
creating your menu with flixable dashboard to allow adding editing and deleting items from the menu.
menu are catageory based
checkout your customers reviews devided into reviewed and non-reviewed.
